results.title: Safety and efficacy of topical simvastatin plus cholesterol cream versus topical simvastatin cream alone for porokeratosis ptychotropica: A randomized, single-blind, split-body, placebo-controlled, investigator-initiated trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Both topical @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ were well tolerated and effective in relieving the @DISEASE_Erythema @DISEASE_MESH:D004890 @@@erythema@@@, thickness, scaling, and @<m>DISEASE_Pruritus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@pruritus@@@ of @DISEASE_Porokeratosis @DISEASE_MESH:D017499 @@@PP@@@ with relatively long-term use.

citations.NLM: Chen Z, Liu Y, Yu H, Li J, Huang X, Xiang R, Mo R, Chen H, Yang Y. Safety and efficacy of topical simvastatin plus cholesterol cream versus topical simvastatin cream alone for porokeratosis ptychotropica: A randomized, single-blind, split-body, placebo-controlled, investigator-initiated trial. results.title: Statin-related Lichenoid Dermatosis: An Uncommon Adverse Reaction to a Common Treatment
results.journal: Eur J Case Rep Intern Med
results.text_hl: We present the case of a 65-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with severe @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, who developed generalized @DISEASE_Mouth_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009059 @@@erythematous cutaneous lesions@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pruritus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@pruritus@@@, resembling @DISEASE_Lichen_Planus @DISEASE_MESH:D008010 @@@lichen planus@@@, months after starting treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Vesza Z, Pires C, da Silva PM. Statin-related Lichenoid Dermatosis: An Uncommon Adverse Reaction to a Common Treatment Eur J Case Rep Intern Med. 2018;5(5):000844. PMID: 30756034
